attributes.action: Give every citizen the right to build their own house, once, on their own land.
attributes.additional_details: The government should not have the right to stop citizens from creating their own residence, should the citizen wish to, on their own land. Local authorities should not be able to stop citizens from loving debt free in their own way.
attributes.background: Legislate that every citizen has the right, once, to build or create their own property on their own land, without requiring permission from any local authorities, subject to meeting building regulations and council tax requirements.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for where you live. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
